nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: textarea
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Euro Disneyland is sure of its success at the beginning. Euro Disneyland manages to create a unique manner appropriate to its European home. It is characterized by European legends and fairy tales. Besides, direction signs in the theme park will be in French as well as in English, and some performers will speak French, Spain and English. And the convenient communications will also contribute to its success. People in Paris can reach Euro Disney by express railway in less than an hourâ€•from Mona Lisa to Minnie Mouse in a flash. And it takes people from any parts of Europe less than two hours by flight to enjoy Euro Disney.
